verses.name: John 12:35
verses.text: Then Jesus said unto them, Yet a little while is the light with you. Walk while ye have the light, lest darkness come upon you: for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth.

verses.name: John 12:36
verses.text: While ye have light, believe in the light, that ye may be the children of light. These things spake Jesus, and departed, and did hide himself from them.

verses.name: John 12:37
verses.text: But though he had done so many miracles before them, yet they believed not on him:
